review: It is easy to install and use and everything that I expected it to be! ABSOLUTELY WONDERFUL! The comparison to similar products was correct. It is the best, hands down. I'm so glad that I purchased one!
author: suzanne cooley

review: Great when it works. How often do I have to unplug or de register it for it to work properly? ALL THE TIME! it's not like technology is a new thing. My old ROKU works better than this. I have been a loyal Amazon Custer for 12 years now and I am highly disappointed!
author: Amber.marentette

review: it rocks. so much entertainment for such little money
author: william carter

review: I am very pleased with my Fire TV Stick.
author: Lavitta Galarde

review: easy to install up & running in < 30 min
author: James A croft

review: I love this product!  It was incredibly simple to hook up and has tons of things you can do with it.
author: Gina Jones

review: I got this for a good price and use it often, but I prefer my Roku. My Fire Stick lags often, is sometimes buggy, and doesn't have as many channels to choose from.
author: Jessica Blount

review: Does what I need it to do for the guest room
author: Jonathan

review: I did not have good luck with Fire stick. It froze constantly every 10 seconds. I had much better luck with Roku.
author: Ken
